name: A Crafting Game
description:
Hey guys, this is a game I did following an online course to improve my code skills.

It doesn't have an end or a goal is literally a sandbox but I hope you can have a bit of fun with it!

No sounds in-game.

Any feedback is really appreciated!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • LEFT CLICK ON SOMETHING to interact
  • TAB to open the inventory
  • ESC to close the game
